div.div: We know how disappointing it is to miss this first important milestone in your child’s education.
VIEW MORE About Kindergarten Round-Up Update

This week’s Choice Boards contain options for each content area each day. It is not required or suggested that your student complete all options.
VIEW MORE About Elementary Choice Board Update
The Spring Hill School District is proud to announce its 2021 District Teachers of the Year, Katie Smith at Timber Sage Elementary School, and Mary Larson at Spring Hill High School.
VIEW MORE About 2021 District Teachers of the Year
Barnhill and Dziadosz new director roles

We appreciate those of you who have given us grace as we start this new process of educating students.
We hope your student’s first day with the Continuous Learning Plan (CLP) was successful!
Congratulations to Polly Dvorak and all of the other March 2020 Price Chopper Nominees

a.title: Dayton Creek Elementary School Principal Announced

div.div: Dayton Creek Elementary School Principal Announced
The Spring Hill School District is proud to announce Darcy Sly has been selected as the principal for Dayton Creek Elementary School for the 2021-22 school year.

span.br: We know you’ve experienced an employee going above and beyond for you, a student, a parent, a peer, or a community member. Please help us recognize that employee by completing this short

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; clear: none; list-style: outside none disc; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 19.32px; font-size: 14px; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(20, 24, 35);

p.span: . All employees nominated will be recognized at the end of each month and one of those nominees will be chosen as the monthly Character Award winner, sponsored by Spring Hill Price Chopper.
